title: Sample, 1934–35
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: plain weave and twill weave
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Woven sample mounted to a cardboard card with notations by the designer. Horizontal stripes of varied widths in green, red, bright pink and white with herringbone pattern. Warp is white cotton; wefts are green bouclé, red chenille, red two-ply yarns, white chenille, and bright pink three-ply yarn.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, 1934–35.
1934–35. Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: plain weave and twill weave. Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin. 1972-75-17.
